docs.snippet: The World Cup is coming to the Amazon.
docs.lead_paragraph: The World Cup is coming to the Amazon.

headline.main: The Heat Is On: World Cup Comes to the Amazon

docs.snippet: Fullback Mattia De Sciglio will remain with Italy's squad even though he has been ruled out of the Azzurri's World Cup opener against England on Saturday due to a strained leg muscle.
docs.lead_paragraph: Fullback Mattia De Sciglio will remain with Italy's squad even though he has been ruled out of the Azzurri's World Cup opener against England on Saturday due to a strained leg muscle.

headline.main: De Sciglio Stays With Italy Despite Missing Opener
headline.print_headline: De Sciglio Stays With Italy Despite Missing Opener

docs.snippet: At the age of 22, Thibaut Courtois already has a pile of silverware and a reputation as one of the best goalkeepers in the world.
docs.lead_paragraph: At the age of 22, Thibaut Courtois already has a pile of silverware and a reputation as one of the best goalkeepers in the world.

headline.main: At 22, Courtois Among Best World Cup Goalies
headline.print_headline: At 22, Courtois Among Best World Cup Goalies

docs.snippet: The Op-Ed columnist handicaps the national teams as the world will now “pause for a month,” to follow the action in Brazil.
docs.abstract: The Op-Ed columnist handicaps the national teams as the world will now “pause for a month,” to follow the action in Brazil.

docs.snippet: Uruguay coach Oscar Tabarez is still unsure whether Luis Suarez will play in the team's World Cup opener against Costa Rica on Saturday, despite the striker joining in regular training for the first time since a knee operation.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay coach Oscar Tabarez is still unsure whether Luis Suarez will play in the team's World Cup opener against Costa Rica on Saturday, despite the striker joining in regular training for the first time since a knee operation.

headline.main: Uruguay Coach: Suarez Still Doubtful for Opener
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Coach: Suarez Still Doubtful for Opener

docs.snippet: The grass at the Arena da Amazonia will be green for England's game against Italy, either naturally or artificially.
docs.lead_paragraph: The grass at the Arena da Amazonia will be green for England's game against Italy, either naturally or artificially.

docs.snippet: Here is a list of World Cup holders' first matches at the next tournament, after Spain, who won in 2010, were trounced 5-1 by the Netherlands in Salvador, Brazil, on Friday.

headline.main: Factbox: World Cup Holders' Opening Games at Next Finals

docs.snippet: Many footballers would struggle to recover from a lapse that cost his team the league title. After a difficult few weeks, Liverpool captain Steven Gerrard's mind is clear of the anguish and ready to lead England at the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Many footballers would struggle to recover from a lapse that cost his team the league title. After a difficult few weeks, Liverpool captain Steven Gerrard's mind is clear of the anguish and ready to lead England at the World Cup.

headline.main: Gerrard Puts Slip Behind Him to Lead England
headline.print_headline: Gerrard Puts Slip Behind Him to Lead England

docs.snippet: When no one expected it, the Dutch turned on the style with a barrage of spectacular World Cup goals and a 5-1 victory on Friday that totally humiliated defending champion Spain.
docs.lead_paragraph: When no one expected it, the Dutch turned on the style with a barrage of spectacular World Cup goals and a 5-1 victory on Friday that totally humiliated defending champion Spain.

headline.main: Dutch Dazzle World Cup With Great Win Over Spain
headline.print_headline: Dutch Dazzle World Cup With Great Win Over Spain

docs.snippet: After falling behind 1-0, Costa Rica scored three goals in the second half to defeat Uruguay in one of the first upsets of the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: After falling behind 1-0, Costa Rica scored three goals in the second half to defeat Uruguay in one of the first upsets of the World Cup.

headline.main: World Cup 2014: Costa Rica Defeats Uruguay, 3-1
